name: Baie Ste Anne: Market of Masks
description:
Creole market. 8 masks, 4 gourds, 2 parrots. Naia trades a map scrap.

Riddle: "Every mask reveals more than a face."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of Creole market. 8 masks, 4 gourds, 2 parrots. Naia trades a map scrap.. bustling_creole_market_awnings with textile_pattern_vibrant_colors. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_awnings_midground_stalls_foreground_naia. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: traditional_masks, market_vendor_naia. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail

puzzle_data.scene: Creole market. 8 masks, 4 gourds, 2 parrots. Naia trades a map scrap.
puzzle_data.riddle: Every mask reveals more than a face.
